info.title: Expander
info.description: Builds an Expander object. It consists of a miniature, an expansion, and the toggling switch. By clicking the switch, the miniature and the expansion swap "displays".

prop.name: miniature
prop.description: The miniature holder of the expander.

prop.name: expansion
prop.description: The expansion holder of the expander.

method.name: build
method.description: Builds the expander's structure and returns the object for further manipulation.

parameter.name: $miniature
parameter.description: An element to be appended in the miniature part of the expander.

parameter.name: $expansion
parameter.description: An element to be appended in the expansion part of the expander.

parameter.name: $expanded
parameter.description: The initial state of the expander. Default is minified.

method.name: appendToMiniature
method.description: Appends an element to the miniature section

method.name: appendToExpansion
method.description: Appends an element to the expansion section
